original_text: And he shall offer of the sacrifice of the peace offering an offering made by fire unto the Lord; the fat thereof, and the whole rump, it shall he take off hard by the backbone; and the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards,
korean_text: 그는 그 화목제의 제물 중에서 여호와께 화제를 드릴지니 그 기름 곧 미골에서 벤 기름진 꼬리와 내장에 덮인 기름과 내장에 붙은 모든 기름과

sentences.original_text: And he shall offer of the sacrifice of the peace offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 화목제의 희생물 중에서 바칠 것이니

sentences.original_text: an offering made by fire unto the Lord
the fat thereof, and the whole rump
it shall he take off hard by the backbone
and the fat that covereth the inwards
and all the fat that is upon the inwards
